list.note: voucher is a document which can be used as proof that a monetary transaction has occurred between two parties. In business, a payment voucher can be used for a variety of purposes, sometimes taking the place of cash in a transaction, acting as a receipt, or indicating that an invoice has been approved for payment.

Deluxe Printing provides printing services in multiple colors, including full-color or single-color offset printing on high-grade Self Carbon or NCR paper. Our top-quality forms utilize self-carbonating paper and are available in duplicates, triplicates, and more. We keep a stock of popularly used colored papers in shades of pink, yellow, green, and blue. The superior quality of our self-carbonizing paper ensures ink transfer to the final copy in a set. Custom sizes for company Payment Vouchers are available, as well as standard A5 format. We accept orders starting from 10 books and guarantee printing within five working days. Choose from our selection of payment voucher templates, or send us your own template along with the required number of copies to receive a quote.

list.note: sticker_glossLamination Stickers offer a superb enhancement to the overall look and durability of your printed stickers. By applying a thin plastic film, either in Matte or Gloss finish, over the printed surface of your sticker, you achieve a sleek and polished look. This layer of lamination not only elevates the visual appeal of your stickers but also fortifies them against external elements. It effectively shields your stickers from damage such as scratches, moisture, and general wear and tear, ensuring they remain vibrant and intact for a longer duration. Laminated stickers are an excellent choice for those looking to combine style with functionality, providing an extra layer of protection that helps preserve the quality and color of the print.

Custom paper stickers serve as powerful tools for marketing, ideal for adding a personalized touch to both products and services. They offer an innovative way to directly communicate promotions or important information to your customers. In a business-to-business context, custom stickers act as excellent promotional allies, quickly grabbing the attention of prospective clients. Moreover, they significantly bolster the image of your brand, boosting the chances of successful partnerships. Our services ensure rapid delivery of high-quality custom sticker printing across Dubai and nationwide, helping your business stand out effortlessly.

We offer high-quality Matt Paper stickers and labels available in both vibrant full-color and classic black & white. Our products are durable, cost-effective, and crafted with precision to meet the highest standards of quality. Choosing our Matt stickers to represent your brand is an excellent strategy to enhance your visibility and showcase your unique identity in the marketplace.

list.note: PVC sticker printing in Dubai is one of the most popular choices for both businesses and individuals looking for a durable and versatile solution for their labeling and branding needs. PVC stickers are ideal for any flat surfaces, offering a sleek and professional appearance.
Longer Lifespan: PVC stickers are known for their durability, ensuring that your labels remain intact and legible for an extended period.
Versatility: These stickers are perfectly suited to work around corners, curves, and edges, making them ideal for a variety of applications.
Enhanced Protection: Adding lamination to PVC stickers can further improve their lifespan, providing additional protection against scratches, moisture, and UV exposure.

list.note: Epoxy stickers, also known as epoxy bubble stickers or epoxy 3D stickers, are crafted from polyurethane. This material is poured over each decal, forming a clear, thick layer that imparts a high-quality, three-dimensional appearance. The transparent coating enhances the epoxy labels, giving them an eye-catching 'pop' that stands out to everyone. These stickers are commonly found on wrappers, cans, bottles, CD bags, envelopes, and folders. Additionally, many vehicles today feature epoxy stickers with the manufacturer's brand logo. The durability and striking look of epoxy stickers make them a popular choice for various applications.
To ensure the perfect fit, we offer the option of creating physical samples before moving forward with the full print run. This allows you to verify the fit and finish, giving you peace of mind.
Additionally, we manufacture durable outdoor epoxy stickers designed to withstand harsh weather conditions, ensuring your labels remain intact and vibrant, no matter the environment.

list.note: Introducing our new repositionable vinyl window clings! These clings are simple to apply and remove in less than a minute, giving the effect of a sticker without any messy adhesive.

With excellent durability, you can easily change their position whenever needed. Designed specifically for glass and windows, these clings are perfect for any DIY project, eliminating the need for a professional applicator.
Our window clings are non-adhesive, ensuring a secure 'cling' to the window for easy placement, removal, and repositioning. Reusable and convenient, they make decorating and redecorating a breeze.

list: Apply a 2mm bleed over the finished size Convert all fonts to paths or curves Convert all colors to CMYK or Grayscale (no RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors)  Flatten transparency effects Set overprints correctly for desired result Remove all color profiles Ensure all bitmap images are minimum 300dpi and in CMYK color mode Ensure reversed type (light type on dark background) is a minimum of 7pt Supply all files separately as individual PDFs (not multi-page documents) Ensure borders and type are within safe zone as variations may occur when trimming Remove registration marks, keylines, dielines, and other non-printing items If crop marks are required, ensure they are positioned outside the bleed area

Order your event tickets or coupons through Deluxe Printing for superior quality. Deluxe offers cost-effective printing solutions for custom vouchers or coupons with a fast turnaround time. Additionally, we provide printing services for gift certificates that include barcodes or QR codes.
Privacy Window Film and stickers are used on glass surfaces in offices, restaurants, and stores to create a frosted glass look. This application enhances privacy and addresses visibility concerns.

list.title: Reverse Cut Frosted Stickers
description: The design is precisely extracted from the frosted vinyl, creating clear cut-outs where the images or graphics are located, allowing for direct visibility through these areas.
Each decal will typically be shaped as a square or rectangle, with the design elements meticulously trimmed out of the larger form.
Prior to installation, the sticker is carefully pre-spaced and covered with transfer tape for accurate placement.

list.title: Standard Cut Frosted Stickers
list.description: The letters or logo will be precisely cut into the exact shape from the frosted vinyl, with internal elements of the artwork removed to prevent them from being solid.  As illustrated in the image, the interior of the 'p' is cut out rather than left solid. It will bear no color and will simply retain a frosted translucent effect.

list.title: Printed Frosted Stickers
list.description: The design is directly applied to the surface of the frosted vinyl material using a four-color printing process.  This technique preserves all the colors in the design while also permitting light to pass through both the printed and unprinted areas, thanks to the translucent properties of the material.

list.title: Blank-Frosted
list.description: This will be a solid, unprinted, and non-cut frosted vinyl, providing a genuine, solid frosted effect. It will be installed in its original form, with no modifications.

list.title: Letterhead
description: With our premium letterhead printing services available in Dubai and Abu Dhabi, you can enhance the overall impression of your company. Our specialty at Deluxe Printing lies in crafting memorable company letterheads. Choose from a variety of designs, opt for on-demand printing, and utilize environmentally friendly Recycled Letterhead material. Environmental conservation is a priority for us. We offer recycled Letterhead Paper upon our clients' request, delivering excellent environmentally friendly paper results on a stock that is brighter and more uniform in color. Recycled paper can be ordered at no additional cost compared to other stocks. Our full-color letterhead printing is available on high-quality paper stocks such as Conqueror, Fedrigoni, woodfree, Executive Bonds, and other renowned brands.
Elevate the professionalism of your correspondence with a meticulously crafted letterhead. Order yours today and leave a lasting impression!

list.title: Envelopes
description: Look no further than Deluxe Printing for all your Business Envelope Printing needs in Dubai. From customizable options to ready-made standard business envelopes and window envelopes, we have everything you need for your next business mailing. Streamline the process by incorporating your logo and address onto specialty peel and seal or self-seal business envelopes and save valuable time.
Enhance your correspondence with personalized envelope printing, injecting each envelope with your distinctive style and brand identity.
Discover our selection of pre-designed envelope printing solutions for a quick and polished outcome. Effortlessly blend convenience with a unique touch by exploring our range today!

list.title: Folders
description: A presentation folder is a versatile tool designed to organize and showcase important documents for business presentations. Typically featuring single or double pockets, these folders securely hold company profiles, brochures, and other materials. Whether printed or plain, presentation folders serve as an essential aid during sales pitches and customer meetings, helping to streamline the sales process and leave a professional impression.

list.title: Notepads
description: Explore our range of perforated notepads tailored to your needs at Deluxe Printing. Whether you require a specific size, shape, or number of sheets, we've got you covered. Stand out from the crowd with custom die-cut shapes that catch the eye! Each pad boasts a generous number of pages, typically 50 or more, and is reinforced with chipboard for added durability. For those seeking unique touches, consider options like rounded corners or side printing. Our woodfree 80gsm stock is favored for its smooth writing surface, though we offer a wide selection of alternatives to suit your preferences. Simply put, if you can envision it, we can bring it to life through print!

list.title: Note-books
description: Deluxe provides customizable hardcover book printing services, allowing you to personalize the cover with your preferred design or brand logo, printed edge-to-edge. Ideal for high-profile corporate events, product promotions, branding initiatives, or training programs, our printing options include full-color printing, thick foiling, or spot UV finishes, imparting a luxurious touch to your books.

list.title: Thank You Cards
description: Ready to elevate your gratitude? Say thanks from the depths of your heart with a personalized card. Whether it's for a birthday bash, a dreamy wedding, or a simple act of kindness, a handwritten thank you note speaks volumes. We specialize in crafting thank you cards that reflect your individuality. From wedding appreciation to professional gestures, our cards are fully customizable. Add your personal touch with photos, bespoke text, and more. Say it with sincerity, say it with style - say thank you like never before.

list.title: Calendars
description: At our calendar workshop, we specialize in curating an eclectic array of calendars, ranging from elegant table calendars to captivating wall calendars, available in an array of sizes and vibrant hues. Each calendar is meticulously crafted using premium-grade materials, ensuring both durability and aesthetic appeal. We take great pride in offering our exquisite collection at incredibly competitive prices, ensuring accessibility for all our customers. Furthermore, our expertise lies in the realm of personalized calendars, tailored to perfectly align with the unique preferences and branding requirements of our clients. Whether it's a sophisticated hanging calendar for the corporate setting or a charming table calendar for personal use, our diverse selection caters to an array of needs. Customization is at the heart of what we do! We understand that personal calendars are as diverse as the individuals who use them, addressing unique preferences and organizational demands. Whether it's a sleek desk calendar taking center stage or a convenient spiral-bound companion, the ultimate aim remains consistent: to effectively manage daily, weekly, and monthly schedules. While personal calendars offer unparalleled portability and individuality, they may fall short when it comes to accommodating the bustling schedules of entire families. That's where our customizable solutions shine, offering versatility and functionality tailored to suit every lifestyle.

list.title: Self Ink Stamps
description: Get your custom stamp in just a few easy steps:  Choose a Shape and Size: Select the preferred shape and size for your stamp from our options. Email Documentation: Send us a copy of your valid trade license and Emirates ID along with the dimensions of the stamp. Proof Approval: Receive the proof of the stamp design via email within minutes. Review and approve the design. Collection or Delivery: Collection: Your stamp will be ready for collection the same day, just 4 hours after approving the draft. Delivery: If you prefer delivery, ensure to approve the stamp draft by 2:00 pm for next-day delivery. Don't have a design yet? No problem!  Our helpful team can assist you in creating a custom stamp. Simply browse our website's Stamp category, choose a template, and email us the template code. We'll take care of the rest!

list.title: Wax Seal
description: Elevate your personal touch with our versatile Sealing Wax Stamp Kits. Crafting your unique Custom Design Wax Seal Stamp has never been easier! Simply select your preferred design and let us handle the rest. Once your stamp is ready, choose from our array of vibrant Sealing Wax colors to add an exquisite touch to event and wedding invitations, personal correspondence, certificates, and packaging. With our help, your creations will radiate sophistication and elegance, making each moment memorable.

list.title: Embossing Seal
description: Certainly! Here's a refined version:   Enhance your product's credibility and project an air of prestige with a company seal. Our embossing seals offer a sophisticated way to imprint logos, monograms, and other designs onto documents, letterheads, certificates, and more. Not only do they add a touch of elegance to your materials, but they also serve as a mark of authenticity, safeguarding your important documents from unauthorized duplication. Elevate your brand's image and ensure the integrity of your paperwork with our high-quality embossing seals.

list.title: Flyers
description: Sure, here's a refined version:
For flawless print results, adhere to these meticulous guidelines:

Bleed Requirements: Ensure a 2mm bleed over the finished size for flyers. Font Precision: Convert all fonts in the brochure to paths or curves for consistent rendering. Color Standards: Utilize CMYK or Grayscale colors exclusively; refrain from using RGB, PMS, Pantone, or Spot colors. Transparency Handling: Flatten transparency effects to prevent unexpected outcomes during printing. Overprint Settings: Set overprints accurately to achieve the desired printing effect. Color Profile Removal: Remove all color profiles to maintain color integrity across platforms. Image Resolution: Bitmap images must have a minimum resolution of 300dpi and be in CMYK format for optimal print quality. Reversed Type: Ensure that reversed type (light type on dark backgrounds) is no smaller than 7pt for readability. File Organization: Provide individual PDF files instead of multi-page documents to facilitate efficient imposition. Safe Zone Considerations: Keep borders and type within the safe zone, as variations may occur during trimming. Non-Printing Elements: Remove registration marks, keylines, dielines, and other non-printing items to maintain clarity. Crop Marks: If crop marks are necessary, position them outside the bleed area to avoid interference with the printed content. Adhering to these specifications will ensure optimal print quality and streamline the printing process.

list.title: Compliment Slips
description: A compliment slip serves as a vital promotional asset, allowing you to express gratitude, offer sincere apologies, respond warmly to requests for price quotes or product catalogs, or provide a delivery note for purchases. With its versatility, a compliment slip transforms the way your company communicates externally and internally, fostering strong and enduring connections with valued clients, business associates, and customers. Elevate your company's communication strategy and cultivate lasting relationships that leave a positive impression.

list.title: Tickets Or Coupons Or Vouchers
description: Elevate your event experience with Deluxe printing for your tickets and coupons, guaranteeing superior quality and professionalism. Whether it's event tickets, coupons, or custom vouchers, Deluxe offers cost-effective printing solutions with a quick turnaround time. Our expert printing services ensure that your materials are produced to the highest standards, leaving a lasting impression on your audience. Additionally, we specialize in printing gift certificates complete with barcodes or QR codes, providing added convenience and security for your customers. Trust Deluxe for all your printing needs and make your event or promotion stand out from the crowd.

list.title: Tent Cards
description: Elevate your brand's presence with our top-tier tent card printing services in Dubai. Our bespoke designs, unparalleled quality, and swift delivery ensure that your message leaves a lasting impact. Contact us today for premium tent card solutions crafted to perfection.

list.title: Die Cut
description: Looking for a unique sticker solution for your brand? Our Die Cut Sticker sheets offer complete customization, allowing you to choose the shape and design that perfectly aligns with your brand identity. With digital printing technology, there are no color restrictions, giving you the flexibility to adapt the design to match the season, celebrate special events, or create exclusive limited-edition designs. Elevate your brand's visibility with our versatile Die Cut Sticker Labels tailored to your unique specifications.Price adjustments based on finishing for items supplied on a sheet. Explore our versatile pricing structure tailored to different finishing options. For additional sizes and pricing details, feel free to reach out and inquire.

list.title: Print Cut
description: Looking for high-quality Kiss Cut sticker printing in Dubai? Look no further! Our customizable Kiss Cut stickers are the perfect choice to showcase your company, brand, or event with style. We meticulously cut around the contour of your design, resulting in a truly unique creation that stands out from the crowd. Our stickers are not only visually appealing but also durable and sticky, ensuring they stay in place wherever you decide to stick them. For added protection against scratches, water, and sunlight, you can opt to laminate them, ensuring they remain vibrant and eye-catching for longer. Choose our Kiss Cut sticker printing services in Dubai for a professional and impactful way to promote your business or event. Let your creativity shine with our customizable options, and make a lasting impression with every sticker you share.

list.title: Transparent Stickers
description: Discover premium transparent stickers that seamlessly blend durability with remarkable water resistance. These translucent stickers are fully customizable, allowing you to incorporate text or integrate your logo for a personalized touch. Crafted in vibrant full color, these stickers maintain absolute transparency, ensuring your design shines through. Add a unique flair to your stickers with the option of enhancing them with pure white ink or a white base layer over your selected color scheme, resulting in vivid and solid front colors. Our transparent stickers come in two finishes: Clear and Ultra-Clear, offering unparalleled see-through quality. Choose from a variety of shapes, sizes, and supply formats to perfectly match your needs and preferences.

list.title: White Ink Stickers
description: Clear White Ink Stickers offer versatility for both indoor and outdoor applications. The addition of white ink enhances opacity, ensuring visibility and a polished finish for your stickers.

list.title: Embossing Seal
description: A corporate seal serves as a mark of authenticity and professionalism, enhancing the credibility of your brand.  Embossing seals offer a sophisticated way to imprint logos, monograms, and other designs onto documents, letterheads, certificates, and more. They not only add a touch of elegance but also serve as a security measure, safeguarding important documents from forgery and unauthorized duplication.

list.title: Kraft Paper
description: Explore our eco-friendly Kraft paper stickers in Dubai, designed for long-lasting use and exceptional customization. Our stickers, made from recycled paper, not only promote sustainability but also showcase our dedication to environmentally friendly printing practices. Ideal for businesses looking to enhance their green credentials, these stickers provide a perfect blend of durability, aesthetics, and environmental responsibility. Whether you need labels for products, packaging, or promotional materials, our eco-friendly solutions ensure that your branding stands out while supporting ecological sustainability. With our eco-conscious labels, embrace the next wave of sustainable sticker production in Dubai. Opt for our services to enjoy top-notch quality coupled with a commitment to environmental responsibility.With our eco-friendly stickers in Dubai, elevate your brand identity sustainably. These environmentally conscious custom stickers and labels offer an innovative solution for enhancing your product packaging and communication, helping your brand make a positive impact on the environment.

list.title: Window Vinyl Lettering
description: Vinyl lettering is a popular and cost-effective method for displaying storefront messages. Whether it's for showcasing working hours, indicating a change of location, displaying a company logo, or posting important notices, vinyl lettering provides a clear and professional look. It adheres easily to windows and glass surfaces, making it a versatile choice for business signage.

list.title: Window-Graphics
description: Window decals are a favored approach for enhancing and branding commercial window fronts. Frequently utilized by businesses such as salons and spas, these decals not only ensure privacy by obstructing external views but also serve as effective promotional tools. Available in various dimensions to suit different window sizes, these window decals are tailored to meet specific branding needs. Premium installation services for these window decals are offered across major cities including Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and Sharjah, catering to a range of establishments from retail shops to corporate offices. Window branding is becoming an essential strategy for marketing your products and enhancing the visibility of your storefront. By transforming windows into attractive advertising spaces, it catches the eye of passersby, potentially increasing foot traffic to your store or business. Deluxe provides comprehensive window branding services, including professional design and installation, at highly competitive rates. Whether you're looking to promote a new product or reinforce brand recognition, our window branding solutions are designed to meet your specific needs and stand out in busy commercial environments.

list.title: One Way Vision
description: Usage: Suitable for both indoor and outdoor environments. Style Options: Choose from multi-piece decals that combine to form a large display or opt for a single, continuous piece for a seamless look. Application: Ideal for sales promotions or advertising on storefronts, these decals also serve multiple functional purposes including privacy maintenance, sun protection, and decorative window signage. They are perfect for use on partition glasses in settings such as hospitals and pharmacies. Note: The effectiveness of one-way vision decals can diminish if the interior is brighter than the exterior, such as a well-lit store during nighttime. This limitation is inherent to all perforated or one-way vision decals. One-way vision films offer a practical solution for branding outlets while displaying ongoing promotions and product details. These custom films not only enhance the aesthetic appeal of a storefront but also contribute to a cooler indoor environment by blocking excess sunlight. Ideal for office spaces, these films maintain external visibility and privacy, making them an effective and functional choice for advertising and sun protection.

list.title: Wall Vinyl Lettering
description: If you're looking to infuse a dash of fun or liveliness into your workspace or home, vinyl lettering offers a fantastic solution. Whether it's inspiring quotes or whimsical messages, vinyl lettering allows for a personalized touch tailored to your space. Vinyl lettering involves precision-cut letters, shapes, and graphics crafted directly from vinyl material, which is available in white or a variety of other colors from our extensive catalog. This customization ensures that whatever your design vision, it can be brought to life exactly as you imagine. At Deluxe, our skilled team is ready to assist with even the most intricate installations. Our goal is to transform your environment into a more joyful and inspiring place. Whether it's a simple message in a study or an elaborate graphic in a corporate lobby, we make sure that every installation is perfect.

list.title: Wall Graphics
description: Usage: Indoor and Outdoor- Our high-quality vinyl is durable enough for outdoor conditions while being perfect for indoor aesthetics. Whether exposed to the elements or enhancing an interior, our products stand the test of time.Application: Versatile Settings- Ideal for a range of locations, including offices, retail stores, shopping malls, boutiques, and cafes. Our vinyl products can transform any environment, adding a professional or creative touch that captivates and impresses. Shape Options: Customizable Dimensions- We offer standard full-size options that extend from edge to edge, providing a seamless look. Custom shapes and sizes are also available to perfectly match the specific dimensions of your space, ensuring a perfect fit every time. Our team is dedicated to providing not just products but solutions that enhance and elevate the spaces they inhabit. Whether you're looking to brand your business environment or add a personal touch to your personal space, our vinyl lettering and decals are designed to meet your needs.

list.title: Canvas
description: Transform Your Space with Our Premium Glossy Canvas Prints Elevate your decor with stunning glossy canvas prints that bring your artwork and photographs to life. Perfect for homes, offices, or art galleries, our large-scale canvases add a vibrant touch to any environment. Transform your digital images into breathtaking masterpiecesâ€”whether you're showcasing abstract pieces or highlighting your best photography. Crafted on high-quality, durable woven canvas with a glossy finish, each print captures vibrant colors and crystal-clear details. Our canvas prints not only enhance the visual appeal but also serve as a focal point in any room. Personalize your canvas print further by adding text, decorative borders, or creating a unique collage of your favorite memories. Available in various sizes, our custom canvas prints are designed to suit both expansive and intimate spaces.

list.title: Wooden Frames
description: We offer an extensive collection of frames that are perfect for encasing your photographs, artworks, cherished mementos, or elegantly designed certificates. Our selection spans from classic vintage designs to sleek, modern aesthetics. Through expert craftsmanship, meticulous selection, and innovative design, we strive to craft a display-worthy piece. With our custom framing options, you have the freedom to select each component of your frame, tailoring it to your specific needs. This bespoke service provides a deeply personal touch to your framing project. Opt for custom frame design when you desire something truly exceptional, enhancing the beauty of your piece while also safeguarding it for the future.

list.title: Acrylic Frames
description: Acrylic is a superior choice for photo mounting, particularly when paired with advanced face-mount techniques that place the photo beneath the acrylic sheet. The inherent clarity and shine of acrylic amplify the colors and vibrancy of your images while providing essential protection and sturdiness. The result is a breathtaking, enduring, and resilient display piece, perfect for exhibitions and public spaces. Our exquisite acrylic floating frames, featuring elegant metal fixtures, will take your display to the next level. In these frameless designs, your artwork is encased between two clear acrylic panels, creating a seamless, borderless visual effect. This allows your photographs and artworks to truly shine, unobstructed by traditional framing.

list.title: Pens
description: Promotional pens are a versatile and cost-effective marketing tool, perfect for graduates, students, sales staff, and anyone who needs to jot down notes or lists. These pens are ideal for events, exhibitions, and trade show giveaways, offering an excellent alternative to business cards with their longer lifespan and daily usability. Easy to customize with multi-color prints or engravings, promotional pens ensure your brand leaves a lasting impression. Available in various materials such as plastic, metal, rubberized, crystal, stylus, bamboo, and eco-friendly options, they cater to diverse preferences and underscore your brandâ€™s commitment to practicality and sustainability.
